title: ml5.js: KNN Classification Part 3
description: In this last part, I demonstrate how to save and load the KNN Classification model. (The code linked below will work with 0.2.1 of ml5 and will be updated when the new 0.2.2 release comes out.)

codeExamples.title: KNN Classification
codeExamples.description: This sketch demonstrates how to train the KNN image classifier.

links.title: Coding Challenge #151 Ukelele Tuner
links.description: In this challenge, I attempt to create a Ukulele tuner in JavaScript using p5.js, ml5.js and the pre-trained machine learning model CREPE: A Convolutional Representation for Pitch Estimation.

links.title: Beginners Guide to Machine Learning in JavaScript
links.description: This playlist provides an introduction to developing creative coding projects with machine learning.
